title: Golf words
summary: Common golf words and phrases explained simply.
description: This pack introduces the most common words and phrases you’ll hear in golf. It’s designed for juniors and parents who are new to the game, and explains things in plain English with practical examples you’ll recognise on the course.

pages.title: Golf language
pages.summary: A quick guide to the kind of words you’ll hear on the course.

pages.title: Scoring words
pages.summary: Par, birdie, bogey, stableford and what they actually mean.

pages.title: Course words
pages.summary: Tee box, fairway, rough, green, bunker and more.

pages.title: Other common words
pages.summary: Handicap, tee time, gimmes, mulligans and other phrases you’ll hear.

pages.title: Quick check
pages.summary: A short quiz to see what you’ve picked up.
